sub_title: Accelerating the future and pace of engineering and science. Senior Account Manager EDU Benelux, Nordics and Baltics at MathWorks.
summary:
Social, extrovert, bilingual (Dutch and English) senior sales professional (8 years+ experience in inside and field sales roles) with international management ambitions. Obtained a BBA. in International Business and Management Studies, obtained a MSc. in International Management. Lean Six Sigma Green Belt, PRINCE2, Agile and Scrum accredited.  Lived, studied and worked in Brussels (U.S. Embassy), London (Ontario, Canada), Cork (Ireland), Vlissingen, Tilburg, Den Bosch and currently Eindhoven, the Netherlands. At MathWorks I look after the Benelux, Nordic and Baltic region.

Achievement FY2022: 104%

Joined committees and boards at Tilburg University, volunteered for several years (including a project for 3 weeks in Vietnam).
Training public speaking by joining Toastmasters International, developing myself by learning Italian.

awards.title: Most Valuable Player
awards.description: Due to my achievements in Q4 FY16, I was awarded the MVP award for the Benelux/Nordics Region.

awards.title: IBMS student of the year
awards.description: At the graduation ceremony I was awarded as IBMS student of the (school)year 2011/2012. I was awarded this title due to the fact that I completed the Bachelor in three years instead of the regular four years. I was the first student to achieve this for that Bachelor.

certifications.name: VOP-License Expert (LE) 3 - Solution Provider and Corporate Reseller

profile_positions.description:
In my role, together with my team, I am responsible for all the Educational accounts in the Benelux, Nordics and Baltics.
This includes universities, universities of applied sciences, research institutes and academic hospitals.

profile_positions.title: Account Manager EDU Benelux/Denmark/Iceland

profile_positions.description:
As with internet, electricity and coffee no organization can do without data. Data is essential for the continuity of the organization. Data management focuses on being in control of the data. This is possible with the right IT infrastructure, and the right services from AnylinQ.

We know all there is to know about data. Let your data work for you!

Solutions: Commvault, Huawei, Zerto, Druva, VMware, Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services, Fortinet
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Dutch Market (commercial, north Netherlands), interacting with VMware's channel ecosystem and all cross functional departments.

•	Engaging with customers and channel partners to drive, grow and close business
•	Creating business plans, revenue goals, sales targets and partner enablement
•	General administrative duties such as pricing, re-assignment and support escalations
•	Weekly forecasting of sales figures
•	Meeting and exceeding KPI’s in addition of detecting opportunities and building pipeline
•	Designing and executing multi-channel marketing drives

Achievements:
Q3 FY 2016: 138% of plan.
Q4 FY 2016: 162% of plan. 
MVP Benelux/Nordics region Q4 FY16
Q1 FY 2018: 172% of plan.
Q2 FY 2018: 118% of plan.
profile_positions.title: Inside Territory Executive

profile_positions.description:
I have recently undertaken a two year graduate programme as an Inside Sales Associate with VMWare in Ballincollig, Co. Cork. As of March 1, 2016 I moved from Sales Associate to Territory Executive.My duties include (but are not limited to) :

• Accountable for driving business, and meeting or exceeding quota goals, in an assigned territory.

• Responsible for all duties from prospecting to closing accounts, in partnership with the outside sales executive.

• Prospect, generate, qualify and follow up on assigned leads.

• Provide accurate and timely updates on pipeline and forecast utilizing SalesForce.

• Articulate the full range of VMware technologies, products, and services and identify how these products and services align to customer needs.

• Communicate technical, industry, and market facts to position VMware as a competitive solution with customers.

• Collaborate with colleagues, cross-functionally (Outside Sales Executive, SEs, Channel Partners, Marketing, etc), to support the sales strategy.

• Maintain in-depth product, industry trend, and technical knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Associate

profile_positions.description: Improvement of the Master program International Management.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Sounding Board

profile_positions.description:
Chairman of the Master Committee at Asset | International Business & Management.
Responsible for arranging an alumni dinner, an excursion and the functioning of the committee.
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Master Committee

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the budget, location of the gala, and all other financial issues.
profile_positions.title: Treasurer of the Lustrum Committee

profile_positions.description:
As board member of S.K.V. Melmac (Studenten Korfbal Vereniging) , in the position of Treasurer, I am responsible for the financial overview of the association. Personal goals in this board year are:
- Finding more partners for S.K.V. Melmac
- Arranging a team to participate in an international tournament outside the Netherlands.
- Arranging new clothing for the teams.

Being treasurer is a very responsible and challeging task, in which I develop myself in new ways.
profile_positions.title: Treasurer

profile_positions.description:
As board member of Asset | Economics in the position of External Affairs Officer, I am responsible for all contacts with our partners. Furthermore I am coordinator of several committees, such as the Economics Dinner, the Case Day and the Magazine committee. 
A personal goal this year is the development of a new committee, in cooperation with the Law Faculty and the University.
A fulltime responsibility in which I can develop myself in several ways.
profile_positions.title: External Affairs Officer

profile_positions.description: As an intern, I was responsible for the promotion of a new project by Math Stassen, called Residenza Trinity. An complete marketing plan was wirtten for this project, including an overview of the possible threats and competitors. This internship was part of the graduation process of Hogeschool Zeeland University of Applied Sciences.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description: Intern at the Commercial Service. Being responsible for several events, including an event for over 100 journalists in cooperation with Visit USA. I also conducted a market research for an injection molding company trying to enter the Belgian market.
profile_positions.title: Intern Commercial Services

volunteer_experiences.description: During the TIE from Asset Tilburg I went to Vietnam, together with 22 other volunteers. During three weeks we assisted in an orphanage in several ways. From teaching English to helping with the cooking, we tried to be of help. An invaluable experience that I will never forget
During four weeks I will be helping an elder to use a computer/smartphone/tablet. This way, a whole generation can stay connected and stay mobile.

When living in Oost-Souburg (the Netherlands) I have been a youth trainer for children in the age of 10 up to the age of 18 (different teams) at Korfbalvereniging Fortis. I trained them twice a week for one hour, and coached them during the matches on Saturday.
When living in Oost-Souburg (the Netherlands) I have been a youth referee at Korfbalvereniging Fortis. Leading the matches on Saturdays, once a month.

For the Vmware Toastmasters chapter of Toastmasters International, my role as secretary is as follows:
Responsible for the club records, taking meeting minutes and responsible for the overall functioning of the committee.
Toastmasters International itself enables members to educate themselves in the field of public speaking, by encouraging members to speech, both prepared speeches as impromptu speeches.

S.V. Conventus will celebrate it's 3rd Lustrum in 2020. I have taken a role in the Lustrum committee to assist in the planning and execution of the events throughout the year. One of the highlights is the creation of our beer, which is sold at the canteen.

I have taken the role as treasurer (ad interim) for S.V. Conventus. In this role, I'm also a member of the daily board. Besides that, as treasurer I'm also the chairman of the financial committee, which consists of three other persons.
